name: API Endpoints Demo
description: Demonstrates API path annotations with different HTTP methods
diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    title: E-Commerce API Flow
    participant Client
    participant API as API Gateway
    participant Products as Product Service
    participant Orders as Order Service

    Client->>API: Get Products @path(GET /api/v1/products)
    API->>Products: Fetch @path(GET /internal/products?limit=50)
    Products-->>API: Product List
    API-->>Client: Products Response

    Client->>API: Create Order @path(POST /api/v1/orders)
    API->>Orders: Process Order @path(POST /internal/orders)
    Orders-->>API: Order Created
    API-->>Client: Order Confirmation

    Client->>API: Update Order @path(PUT /api/v1/orders/123)
    API->>Orders: Modify @path(PATCH /internal/orders/123)
    Orders-->>API: Updated
    API-->>Client: Order Updated

    Client->>API: Cancel Order @path(DELETE /api/v1/orders/123)
    API->>Orders: Remove @path(DELETE /internal/orders/123)
    Orders-->>API: Deleted
    API-->>Client: Order Cancelled
